name: Flickr: Show Group Discussions in compact format
description: Show group discussions in a more compact, easier to read and more manageable style in the new group layout. Also fixes the styles for <blockquote> and <em> that are incorrect in groups. Thread titles are never truncated. This style only affects group discussions (i.e. "Discussions" tab and left pane in other tabs). Check all my other Stylish scripts here. If you find this useful, you can buy me a drink! (or make a donation with the green button at the bottom of this page). Before installing this user-style, you must first install Stylish for Chrome or Stylish for Firefox. ▼ To install this style, click "Install with Stylish" just below ▼
